title: Assess Social Determinants of Health (SDoH)
description: A social worker is screening a patient for social determinants of health, such as food insecurity and transportation issues.

tasks.description: Open the SDoH screening questionnaire in the EHR for the patient.
tasks.expected_outcome: The social worker accesses the standardized screening tool.

tasks.description: Ask the patient the screening questions and document their responses.
tasks.expected_outcome: The patient's answers are accurately recorded in the questionnaire.

tasks.description: Based on the patient's answers indicating a lack of transportation, generate a referral to a community-based transportation service.
tasks.expected_outcome: A social need is identified, and a referral is made to address it, improving the patient's ability to attend appointments.
